name: AIUB CS FEST 2024 - 1st Runner Up
desc: Achieved 1st Runner-Up in the App Showcase category at AIUB CS FEST 2024. Competed against 20+ teams, demonstrating innovative mobile application development and presentation skills.

name: Published Research - Taylor & Francis (IDAA 2025)
desc: Published 'Beyond NER: Medical BERTs for Multi-Label ADR Classification' at IDAA 2025 as a Taylor & Francis Book Chapter. Research on fine-tuning LLMs for healthcare AI.

name: South Asian Climate Conference 2024
desc: Received certificate for participation and presentation at the 2nd South Asian Conference on Climate. Presented research on emerging climate issues with statistical analysis.

name: GitHub Open Source - 36+ Stars
desc: Active open source contributor with 36+ GitHub stars across 26 repositories. Top project: StudentManagementSystem with 17 stars and comprehensive Wiki documentation.

name: Mario's Multiverse Adventure - Game Dev
desc: Led team of 5 to develop 2D platformer with OpenGL for AIUB Computer Graphics course. Created 3 unique game levels with physics engine. YouTube demo available.

name: Spotify Sentiment Analysis - 85-90% Accuracy
desc: Built NLP sentiment classifier analyzing 52,702 Spotify reviews achieving 85-90% classification accuracy using MultinomialNB and TF-IDF vectorization.

name: 54+ Android Development Lessons
desc: Completed comprehensive Android development curriculum from beginner to advanced. Mastered MVVM architecture, Retrofit, Hilt, RxJava3, Room Database, and Firebase integration.
